name: IDI
tagline: Statistics New Zealand Integrated Data Infrastructure
body:
This page provides examples of code created for use in the IDI. 

 If you are a current or potential IDI user who wishes to access more IDI-related code, you can join MeetaData, an online collaborative space created by Statistics NZ for all microdata users and suppliers. Email meetadata@stats.govt.nz. 

Key to source of code files

VHIN: Virtual Health Information Network

T: Treasury
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
